Package com.project.couponProject3.repositories

Interface CouponRepo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Coupon,​java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Coupon,​java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Coupon,​java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Coupon>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Coupon,​java.lang.Integer>
    public interface CouponRepo
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Coupon,​java.lang.Integer>
    Contains all the smart dialect methods of searching coupon in DB
